tool_description: The API set powered by PropMix, provides property listings by accepting various filters like Zip code, Street, City and State. It also provide comparable listings within the given radius, returns the count of listings by accepting various filters and more.
name: REMarketLite APIs
title: REMarketLite APIs

api_list.name: GetListingsByRadius Valuation
api_list.description: Search listings around a point or address within the specified Radius

required_parameters.name: Street
required_parameters.description: Street Address around which radius search needs to be performed

required_parameters.name: Radius
required_parameters.description: Radius in whcih search needs to be done

required_parameters.name: Zip
required_parameters.description: PostalCode of address around which radius search needs to be performed

required_parameters.name: State
required_parameters.description: State of the address around which radius search needs to be performed

required_parameters.name: City
required_parameters.description: City of the address around which radius search needs to be performed

required_parameters.name: OrderId
required_parameters.description: Alpha numeric combinations to uniquely reference an order

optional_parameters.name: Longitude
optional_parameters.description: Longitude of the centre point for Radius Search

optional_parameters.name: Latitude
optional_parameters.description: Latitude of the centre point for Radius Search

api_list.name: GetListingsByGeo IDX
api_list.description: API returns property listings by accepting various filters like Zip code, Street, City and State

required_parameters.name: Zip
required_parameters.description: The PostalCode in which the search needs to be performed

required_parameters.name: OrderId
required_parameters.description: Alpha numeric combinations to uniquely reference an order

required_parameters.name: State
required_parameters.description: The State in which the search needs to be performed

required_parameters.name: City
required_parameters.description: The City in which the search needs to be performed
